title: Looking for various backs for T206 Seymour Throwing
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: Looking for various backs for T206 Seymour Throwing
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone...

I am looking to work on my seymour throwing back set... if you have any of the following please email at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

Looking for T206 Seymour Throwing with the following backs:
Sweet Cap 350 fact 25
Sweet Cap 350 Fact 30
Sweet Cap 350-460 Fact 42 with Overprint
American Beauty 350
Piedmont 350
EPDG
Cycle 460
Lenox
Drum
Blank back
Red Hindu

Let me know if you have any for sale... thanks
Jamie
bump.. so far no luck on finding any of these
Thought you had most of these ?

Hey Adam,

I am actually trying to complete a double backset for seymour... So im looking for 2 of each back :)

some of the ones listed I have 1 of already and need 1 more.. the drum, red hindu, and blank back i need 2 of... I am not even sure there are 2 of these   so even 1 would be nice..

Jamie

That would be a great feat !!

Looking for Schlei portraits !!
